hibernate-mapping.query: select new org.mifos.application.office.business.OfficeView(office.officeId, office.officeName,office.level.id,office.versionNo) from org.mifos.application.office.business.OfficeBO office where office.level.id=:levelId and office.status.id=:statusId and (office.searchId = :OFFICESEARCHID or office.searchId like :OFFICE_LIKE_SEARCHID) order by office.officeName
select office.searchId from org.mifos.application.office.business.OfficeBO office where office.officeId = :OFFICE_ID
select new org.mifos.framework.security.util.OfficeCacheView(office.officeId, office.parentOffice.officeId, office.searchId) from org.mifos.application.office.business.OfficeBO office
from org.mifos.application.office.business.OfficeBO office where office.level.id = :LEVEL_ID
select max(office.officeId)from org.mifos.application.office.business.OfficeBO office
select count(*) from org.mifos.application.office.business.OfficeBO o where o.parentOffice.officeId=:OFFICE_ID
select count(*) from org.mifos.application.office.business.OfficeBO o where o.officeName=:OFFICE_NAME
select count(*) from org.mifos.application.office.business.OfficeBO o where o.shortName=:SHORT_NAME
select count(*) from org.mifos.application.office.business.OfficeBO o where o.parentOffice.officeId=:OFFICE_ID and o.status.id=1

select new org.mifos.application.office.business.OfficeView(office.officeId, office.officeName,office.level.id,lvl.lookUpValue,office.versionNo) from org.mifos.application.office.business.OfficeBO office ,org.mifos.application.master.business.LookUpValueLocaleEntity lvl where lvl.lookUpId=office.level.lookUpValue.lookUpId and office.level.id < :LEVEL_ID and office.status.id=:STATUS_ID and lvl.localeId = :LOCALE_ID

select new org.mifos.application.office.business.OfficeView(ol.id,lvl.lookUpValue) from org.mifos.application.office.business.OfficeLevelEntity ol ,org.mifos.application.master.business.LookUpValueLocaleEntity lvl where lvl.lookUpId=ol.lookUpValue.lookUpId and lvl.localeId = :LOCALE_ID and ol.configured=1 and ol.id !=1 order by ol.id

select new org.mifos.application.office.business.OfficeView(os.id,lvl.lookUpValue) from org.mifos.application.office.business.OfficeStatusEntity os ,org.mifos.application.master.business.LookUpValueLocaleEntity lvl where lvl.lookUpId=os.lookUpValue.lookUpId and lvl.localeId = :LOCALE_ID
from org.mifos.application.office.business.OfficeBO o where o.parentOffice.officeId=:OFFICE_ID
select count(*) from org.mifos.application.office.business.OfficeBO office where office.officeId = :OFFICE_ID and office.status.id = :STATUS_ID
from org.mifos.application.office.business.OfficeBO o where o.level.id != :branchOffice order by o.level.id,o.officeName
from org.mifos.application.office.business.OfficeBO o where o.level.id = :branchOffice order by o.parentOffice.officeName,o.officeName

select new org.mifos.application.office.business.OfficeView(office.officeId, office.officeName, office.versionNo) from org.mifos.application.office.business.OfficeBO office where office.level.id = :LEVEL_ID
from org.mifos.application.office.business.OfficeBO o where o.level.id != :LEVEL_ID and o.searchId like :SEARCH_ID and o.status.id = :STATUS_ID order by o.level.id,o.officeName

select distinct o.parentOffice from org.mifos.application.office.business.OfficeBO o where o.level.id = :LEVEL_ID and o.status.id = :STATUS_ID and o.searchId like :SEARCH_ID order by o.parentOffice.officeName,o.officeName

select new org.mifos.application.office.business.OfficeView(office.officeId, office.officeName,office.level.id,office.versionNo) from org.mifos.application.office.business.OfficeBO office where office.status.id=:STATUS_ID and office.searchId like :OFFICE_LIKE_SEARCHID order by office.level.id, office.officeName
select count(*) from org.mifos.application.office.business.OfficeBO office where office.level.id = :LEVEL_ID
